line.comment: * If a mechanic reached 100 in both engeneering and mechanic skills, do not take him into account when calculating costs
* Only ready mechanics can be trained, which did not reach max values in mechanical and engeneering skills
* If a marine reached 100 in one or more skills, annul his training assignment, if he is to be trained in that skill, do not take him into account when calculating costs

sval.val: If a mechanic reached 100 in both engeneering and mechanic skills, do not take him into account when calculating costs
Only ready mechanics can be trained, which did not reach max values in mechanical and engeneering skills
If a marine reached 100 in one or more skills, annul his training assignment, if he is to be trained in that skill, do not take him into account when calculating costs
